p: To evaluate the impact of the infection and subsequent TNF-Î± expression on the production of SP-A, we measured the SP-A protein content by immunofluorescence staining in the human alveolus-on-a-chip model following infection with IAV, S. aureus or co-infection ( Figure 4C). By using quantitative analysis of the mean fluorescence intensity (MFI) we detected decreased levels of SP-A following infection by S. aureus and in the co-infection scenario ( Figure 4D).
